amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of amendments numbered 2, 28, 29, 30, 31, 32, 33, 37, 40, 41, 45, 53, and 54 printed in part B of House Report 111-479.
amendment.purpose: An amendment offered en bloc consisting of amendments numbered 2, 28, 29, 30, 31, 32, 33, 37, 40, 41, 53, 54, and 45 printed in Part B of House Report 111-479.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A018) offered by Mr. Gordon (TN).
On agreeing to the Gordon (TN) amendments (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
